Title: Live Clinical Assistant: Community
Description: A social network and disease management for people suffering from HIV. It allowed patients to share their experience, gain direct communication with doctors and check their disease history. It was developed utilizing Silverlight, ASP .NET MVC and Windows Azure.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A social network and disease management for people suffering from HIV. It allowed patients to share their experience, gain direct communication with doctors and check their disease history. It was developed utilizing Silverlight, ASP .NET MVC and Windows Azure.
